p: All plotted data were presented as a mean of three different experiments Â± SD. Differences between the calculated means of each individual group were determined by one-way ANOVA test using the statistical tools available in GraphPad Prism 6 software. A value of p < 0.05 was considered statistically significant. Significant differences ( p < 0.05) between EO and respective NLCs in cell viability results for the two cell lines were obtained by using two-way ANOVA with a Tukey post-hoc test.
